expo.name: invKom
expo.description:
Invkom: Store management app that will allow you to sell products and to know what's going on in your store with one click.

Features: 
  - Selling through barcode scanner.
  - Add products.
  - Manage inventory quantities.
  - Fast insights.
  - Selling statement.
  - Authentication/ Authorization
  - Forms Validation.
  - Back-End API
